Test #1

Input: 
arr1 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 80, 11, 22, 33, 44, 55, 66, 77, 88, 99
len1 17
k 1

Output
a) 10 20 30 40 50 60 70 80 11 22 33 44 55 66 77 88 99 
b) 200 50 70 90 110 130 150 91 33 55 77 99 121 143 165 187 109 
c) 200 50 70 90 110 130 150 91 33 55 77 99 121 143 165 187 109

Test #2

Input: 
arr1 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 80, 11, 22, 33, 44, 55, 66, 77, 88, 99
len1 17
k 7

Output:
a) 10 20 30 40 50 60 70 80 11 22 33 44 55 66 77 88 99 
b) 200 600 1200 2000 3000 4200 5600 91 33 55 77 99 121 143 165 187 109 
c) 200 600 1200 2000 3000 4200 5600 91 33 55 77 99 121 143 165 187 109

Test #3

Input:
arr1 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 80, 11, 22, 33, 44, 55, 66, 77, 88, 99
len1 17
k 0

Output

a) 10 20 30 40 50 60 70 80 11 22 33 44 55 66 77 88 99 
b) 30 50 70 90 110 130 150 91 33 55 77 99 121 143 165 187 109 
c) 30 50 70 90 110 130 150 91 33 55 77 99 121 143 165 187 109 

Test #4

Input:
arr1 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 80, 11, 22, 33, 44, 55, 66, 77, 88, 99
len1 17
k 17

Output

a) 10 20 30 40 50 60 70 80 11 22 33 44 55 66 77 88 99 
b) 200 600 1200 2000 3000 4200 5600 880 242 726 1452 2420 3630 5082 6776 8712 990 
c) 200 600 1200 2000 3000 4200 5600 880 242 726 1452 2420 3630 5082 6776 8712 990

Test #5

Input:
arr1 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 80, 11, 22, 33, 44, 55, 66, 77, 88, 99
len1 17
k 18

Output

a) 10 20 30 40 50 60 70 80 11 22 33 44 55 66 77 88 99 
b) 200 600 1200 2000 3000 4200 5600 880 242 726 1452 2420 3630 5082 6776 8712 990 
c) 200 600 1200 2000 3000 4200 5600 880 242 726 1452 2420 3630 5082 6776 8712 990
